website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for serving iced tea or milkshakes at a party.
pros: Each spoon is a different color, so you can quickly tell them apart
Spoons are polished to perfection with no scratches
Spoons have a solid, heavy feel to them
The color choices add a touch of style
cons: Spoons are not safe for use on the stove or in the microwave

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended: unusual, good-quality and really good-looking, too. I'm planning on buying some more and I can give them as a gift. In contrast to some other spoons I ordered, these came nicely polished and without any scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable quality. A+. I was surprised to find these elegant spoons as nice as they are! They are beautiful, perfect as a bridal shower gift. Long handle with the perfect size bowl. You will love these.
customer_reviews.author: Cubby

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy enough to feel nice and weighed while stirring but not too heavy. They look beautiful and are easy to wash. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sepia

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY AS PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: We love them. They look quite Fancy! Perfect for tea party or just a hot chocolate
customer_reviews.author: greatlove#2

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, durable, and good looking
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy long handled spoons. The finish looks high quality and after several months of using and dishwashing, they still look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Good for ice cream shakes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for ice cream shakes and other tall drinks. Just enough slant in the scoop to pick up the ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: LoMay

customer_reviews.title: Handy length
customer_reviews.text: These are a useful length, shorter than traditional cocktail spoons but long enough to get the last of the honey out of the jar without getting sticky fingers :)
customer_reviews.author: bbj

customer_reviews.title: Used to differentiate non dairy milks at coffee shop
customer_reviews.text: I use these spoons at my coffee shop to help differentiate which spoon is to be used on our different non dairy milks. Which makes it very easy for my employees to not mix up which spoon goes with what milk product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Guzman- Ra Coffee Company

customer_reviews.title: wash great
customer_reviews.text: i put mine in the dishwasher and they come out great. also, they are perfect length!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Spoons feel like quality product. Doesn't feel cheap at all!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Impulse Buy That Turned Out Great
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I expected the spoons to look exactly like the picture but they do, absolutely gorgeous. They were an impulse buy, but now I am going to impulse 4 more. :)
customer_reviews.author: MaherIsALoser

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute loony spoon ! Looks like well made , no scratches or blemishes. Not sure how long the polish will last but for now it’s a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: O. napitupulu

customer_reviews.title: Quality spoons
customer_reviews.text: Excellent spoons. Nice long handles, beautiful colors, balanced when using them. Very happy with these spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Ana T.

customer_reviews.title: great iced tea spoons
customer_reviews.text: Everybody that sees them loves their appearance and have no finish issues.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Janes

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These long spoons are just what I was looking for. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Sprite
